name: Shanghai: Shouryuu Sairin
overview: Shanghai - Shoryu Sairin is a conversion of an arcade machine developed by Warashi and released by Activision in the year 2000 using the Taito G-NET hardware. Game Modes: - Shanghai Classic - In To Yo: Sort of a story mode in which the player have to solve the puzzles to advance to the next stage of the story. - Pandamonium In To Yo: Vs mode againts another player or a computer opponent.
